div.p: Thanks to the work of zzz and the help of many testers during the month-long "hackfest", we've got the first new Syndie release in nearly 6 years! Syndie 1.103b is now available for download from syndie-project.i2p, syndie-project.org, and the I2P PPA. Additionally, I2P-hosted torrents are also available If you wanted to try Syndie but were intimiated to build it yourself from source (or you previously tried it and you were frustrated by bugs) give this new version a try!
Note: A full-time maintainer is still sought. Please get in touch if you can help!
